svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.1" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="LangGraph Architecture - C4 Container" id="system-architecture"> <mxGraphModel dx="1426" dy="785" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1200" pageHeight="800" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="user" value="<div><br></div>사용자<b><br></b><div><b>[USER]</b><br><div><br></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E8F2FF;strokeColor=#4A90E2;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="240" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vercel-cdn" value="Vercel Edge Network<br><b>[CDN Container]</b><br><br>• 가비아 도메인<br>• 글로벌 CDN" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#D6E8FF;strokeColor=#4A90E2;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="230" width="190" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nextjs-app" value="Next.js Web App<br><b>[Frontend]</b><br><br>• 양방향 그래프,코드 변환기<br>•&nbsp; 템플릿 미리보기<br>• GUI 편집기 , 코드 편집기" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#B8D7FF;strokeColor=#4A90E2;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="340" width="220" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nestjs-api" value="NestJS API Server<br><b>[Backend Railway]</b><br><br>• OAuth 2.0 인증<br>• AI 서비스 통합<br>• 템플릿 관리 API<br>• AI 사용량 추적" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#9AC7FF;strokeColor=#4A90E2;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="340" width="220" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mongodb" value="MongoDB Atlas<br><b>[Database Container]</b><br><br>• 사용자 데이터<br>• 워크플로우 저장<br>• AI 사용 로그<div><br/></div>" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#7CB3FF;strokeColor=#4A90E2;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="520" width="220" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ai-services" value="OpenRouter API<br><b>[External System]</b><br><br><br>• Multiple LLMs" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFCCCC;strokeColor=#3A7BD5;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="920" y="290" width="140" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="github-oauth" value="GitHub,Goole OAuth<br><b>[External System]</b><br><br>• 유저인증<div><br></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFCCCC;strokeColor=#3A7BD5;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="920" y="420" width="140" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn1" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563eb;" parent="1" source="user" target="vercel-cdn" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="600" y="300" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="650" y="250" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn1-label" value="<span style="">HTTPS 요청<br><br></span>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;shadow=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="conn1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="-3" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn2" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563eb;" parent="1" source="vercel-cdn" target="nextjs-app" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="450" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn2-label" value="SPA 호스팅" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontStyle=1" parent="conn2" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.2" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-19" y="-12" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn4" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563eb;" parent="1" source="nextjs-app" target="nestjs-api" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="450" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn4-label" value="<span style="">REST API</span>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=10;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="conn4" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.05" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="8" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn5" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#2563eb;" parent="1" source="nestjs-api" target="mongodb" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="700" y="500" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="750" y="450" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn5-label" value="Mongoose" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontStyle=1" parent="conn5" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.1" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="29" y="-2" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn6" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#3A7BD5;" parent="1" source="nestjs-api" target="ai-services" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="800" y="350" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="850" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn6-label" value="<span>Openai<br>Client</span>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontStyle=1" parent="conn6" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="-19" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn7" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#3A7BD5;" parent="1" source="nestjs-api" target="github-oauth" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="800" y="450" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="850" y="400" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="conn7-label" value="<span>OAuth 2.0<br>사용자 인증</span>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontStyle=1" parent="conn7" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="25" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9qrJDUiBaivth9Sahc_S-1" value="Goole Form<br><b>[External System]</b><br><br>•피드백 수집<div><br></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFCCCC;strokeColor=#3A7BD5;fontSize=11;align=center;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="540" width="140" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9qrJDUiBaivth9Sahc_S-2" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#3A7BD5;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="nextjs-app" target="9qrJDUiBaivth9Sahc_S-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="870" y="390" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="930" y="370" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6ebbzdHrmPB7pbKd7Not-4" value="<span>External Link</span>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fillColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="580" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-80" y="-76" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(232, 242, 255), rgb(22, 31, 42)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(74, 144, 226), rgb(68, 129, 199));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 36px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

[Frontend]
• 양방향 그래프,코드 변환기
• 템플릿 미리보기
• GUI 편집기 , 코드 편집기

• AI 서비스 통합
• 템플릿 관리 API
• AI 사용량 추적
